name: Gravity Song
description:
"Gravity Song is a challenging game that combines action and puzzle with an awesome ambient music." Description:

By touching the screen, you will be able to move a ball to any direction. Using this ability, you need to find and pass a portal to escape from a room.

I don't want to bore you so I have added a lot of lasers, magnets and more interesting things to make a challenging game.

I offer you 90 challenging levels,

How many can you complete?

Features:
  • 90 challenging levels
  • 5 extra difficult survival levels
  • Multiple skins to unlock
  • Awesome ambient music
Download:

⭐ You can play for free but all donations are highly appreciated 😁 

Instructions:

Download, unzip it and execute Gravity Song.exe
